summary: *Hardcore and immersive, alternative start of Skyrim as an outlaw!*
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/novi_MOD.jpg[/img]
[quote]\"Not all those who wander are lost.\"
- J.R.R. Tolkien[/quote]
[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#ea0000]UPDATES![/color]

[color=#ea0000]v.02[/color]
I\'ve uploaded a new save game with bounty on your head in 3 surrounding provinces: Whiterun, The Reach and Falkreath Hold. The reason is for immersion sake; they know from where you come from, but other provinces don\'t! [color=#caae85]If you don\'t want to start a new game and would like this change, open console and type the following commands: 
player.setcrimegold 1200 0002816c
player.setcrimegold 1200 00028170
player.setcrimegold 1200 000267ea[/color]

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#caae85][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/color]
You start from the very bottom and have to climb up, this time as an outlaw! In others eyes, you are nothing more then a sewer rat, a bandit of society and be sure that many will attack you on sight! The main quest is disabled. Your map is completely empty. You know nothing about the Helgen dragon incident. You know nothing about your dragonborn heritage.  

[color=#ea0000][b]KEY POINTS of THIS SAVE GAME:[/b][/color]

[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]You are a bandit, and a friend of all bandits of Skyrim[/color]
[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]Main quest disabled, no dragons either, all other quest available[/color]
[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]You start at the BILEGULCH bandit camp[/color]
[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]You\'ve raised a TENT and spread your SLEEPING BAG, and have your personal non-respawning chest (see the gallery)[/color]
[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]There are two camp FIREs for cold nights and for hanging around with other bandits [/color]
[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]In camp you will find almost anything you need - an anvil, a furnace, grindstone, alchemy table, workbench... but, there is NO merchant (until CK comes out)[/color]
[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]Some neutral NPC\'s won\'t attack you - All the guards in 3 provinces (Whiterun, The Reach and Falkreath Hold) will try to take you in or kill you if you disobey[/color]
[color=#ea0000]x [/color][color=#caae85]CARRY WEIGHT is now only 120 for Theanna (vanilla 300), that is equal to aprox. 55kg - no more carrying 20 2-handed weapons and heavy armors[/color]


[color=#caae85][b]STORYLINE[/b][/color]
You are a survivor.

Who could\'ve thought that a veteran bandit leader might have some mercy left in him for common people, but the truth is that with that very rare kind deed, the leader of the Bilegulch camp saved your life. Laying in the mud with a bleeding opened wound bellow your left eye and a blunt trauma to your head, he found you laying surrounded by two bodies of dead imperial soldier, obviously killed by the sword that was still strongly held in your pale hand. He would usually simply walk away and leave you to die, but not this time. He couldn\'t. The hatred he had within him towards the imperial scum, as he would say, overwhelmed him with respect towards that hardly wounded girl, that fighter and survivor that laid under him. He embraced your almost lifeless body in his arms, and took you back to the safety of his camp. For two weeks, one of the bandits, a female alchemist treated you with herbs, and you finally woke up. The blunt trauma to your head took its tool; you remember nothing of your past. Not even your name, so you were named Theanna, a little goddess, for your bravery and stoneskin to survive your last battle. You are one of the family now. The road is harsh, your lifestyle is dangerous - you are a bandit now, as it was written in your destiny! 

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/camp_fotka.jpg[/img][img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/za-post.jpg[/img]
When the bandages are removed, this is how you will look like. The scar under your left eye is a very real reminder over the last battle that your mind decided to forget. Alas, a small price to pay. Raise now, young outlaw, and write your name within the history of Skyrim with the blood of unwary and all the other fools that decided to cross the blades with you! 

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#caae85][b]INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS[/b][/color]
Unrar & extract the save file into the following location:
WIN 7 / Vista - C:\\Users\\[UserName]\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves
WIN XP - C:\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#caae85][b]RECOMMENDED[/b][/color]
- [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6176][b]Wars in Skyrim[/b][/url] by Alexandrox
- Put the game difficulty on Expert level
- Disable the compass - use the sun or stars to navigate (it is possible, I do it when the weather allows me to)
- Disable the crosshair - practice the shooting with arrows on some tree or corner of the house

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#caae85][b]FOR YOUR CHARACTER TO LOOK LIKE THE ONE FROM THE PHOTO[/b][/color]
- [color=#ea0000][b]NOTE[/b] - She is a cross-race, so if you use \"showracemenu\" you will have to reset her with choosing another race[/color]
- [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=515][b]More Freckles[/b][/url] by Zhoken - you need \"Cute freckles\"
- [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329]Beauty faces[/url] by NecKros - for textures and 
- [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url] by mrLenski for Breton \"femalehead_msn\".
- [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30]No more blocky faces[/url] by Xenius
- [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=820]Non-playable armor[/url] by Gibbed

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#caae85][b]TO START THE MAIN QUEST[/b][/color]
Open the console and type \"setstage MQ102 30\". Tho, I gotta warn you, I have no idea what happens with Helgen. Never went there. 

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#caae85][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]
- [i]mod inspired by[/i][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5720] StannieDum\'s \"An alternative Reality\"[/url]

[img]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll97/Mshai85/razmak.jpg[/img]

[color=#caae85]Visit [url=http://www.ivansivak.com]my webpage[/url] if you want to see my artworks and if you want to try another alternative start, try [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6089]Hannah[/url].  If you like this mod, please do endorse it and comment. The positive feedback motivates me to do more and more stuff. ;) Cheers everyone! :)[/color]
author: Mshai

files.name: SAVED game - you have bounty on your head in 3 provinces
